sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of DuPont ( DD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading flat on the day.
Year to date, DuPont has lost about 4.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 1.5%.
Coca-Cola is showing a gain of 1.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading down 1.4%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
